Item.Value: [Text:Eek! Eh... hello! New house person, yes? Me $Character_21$. Place things here with me, yes, I sell for you at night while you sleeps. Mutually beneficial!][Name:Introduction]
[Text:Me going okies today. Bin is comfy, air is fresh. Very happies today][Default][Name:1]
[Text:Why you out in the rain? Is cold! Is wet! Go inside where warm... Do you want to come inside bin? $21$ can scootch over.][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|1]
[Text:Oh! Oh! Thank! Thank you very muchlike. This makes $21$ very happy!][Name:Gift]
[Text:Hello, hello! How can meek, humble $Character_21$ be helping you?][Selection:VillageTalk][ShipGoods][Name:Selection]
[Text:There be many gremlins running around. We stay just out of sight but try to be helpful when we can.][Default][Name:6]
[Text:Yes? Is very wet outside. No like.][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|2]
[Text:Cold! Why so cold? You should go inside, yes. Sleep until Spring.][Weather:Snowing][Name:Snowing|1]
